levels.title: Hello World
levels.description: Learn the basics of C# by creating a simple 'Hello, World!' application.
requirements: Understand the structure of a C# program
Write and execute your first C# program
levels.completionCriteria: Successfully run the program and display 'Hello, World!' in the console.

levels.title: Variables
levels.description: Explore variables and data types in C#.
levels.completionCriteria: Create a program that uses variables to store and display user information.

levels.title: Control Flow
levels.description: Understand control flow statements in C#.
requirements: Learn about if statements, loops, and switch cases
Implement control flow in your programs
levels.completionCriteria: Write a program that uses control flow to make decisions based on user input.
